page.title: 16Pastimes
page.content: Many people in the area travel out to {Brigg }or {Scunthorpe}if they want most sports but if they want to watch football they can watch {Waddingham {F.C.}play (even though the pitch is in a village nearby).Some people do gardening or cut the grass.In Waddingham the teenagers play football on the green or on a small bit of grass on a public path called{"Joshua {Way"}.In September_October time people go to a small fair that comes to the green each year.At night people go to Waddingham pub to play darts,dominoes or cards for cups and trophies against other pubs.Many people go to the{Village Hall}to play bingo.It starts at 7.00pm and finishes at 9.30pm.There is also a snooker room which is well used.Some people in our village like drawing the Church or other interesting buildings.
